list.name: Changes
list.comment: version 1.0.10: - new minimal metatheory to support is_declaratively_member_of_class - feature #242: constant-declaration - issue #238: alpha-equivalence - issue #226: develop minimal logic (M0). - lock mechanism for axiom-inclusion and axiom-interpretation. - new class CollectionDeclaration - issue #229: elaborate intuitionistic logic (j0) theory. - issue #231: compose the theory declaration and list the extended theories. - issue #232: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new inference-rules in a theory. - issue #233: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new axioms / definitions in a theory. - rename theory-elaboration-sequence to theory-derivation which is more accurate. - rename Formula to CompoundFormula. - rename Relation to Connective. - rename Parameter to Terms (in the contect of CompoundFormula). - bug #237: formula equivalence does not account for the presence of free variables in both formula, not necessarily at the same positions. - design flaw correction: UniverseOfDiscourse inherits from TheoreticalObject, and not from SymbolicObject - MGZ21 propositional logic.

task.summary: Default task

version 1.0.10:
issue #226: develop minimal logic (M0).
lock mechanism for axiom-inclusion and axiom-interpretation.
issue #229: elaborate intuitionistic logic (j0) theory.
issue #231: compose the theory declaration and list the extended theories.
issue #232: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new inference-rules in a theory.
issue #233: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new axioms / definitions in a theory.
rename theory-elaboration-sequence to theory-derivation which is more accurate.
bug #237: formula equivalence does not account for the presence of free variables in both formula, not necessarily at the same positions.

issue #233: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new axioms / definitions in a theory.
rename theory-elaboration-sequence to theory-derivation which is more accurate.
bug #237: formula equivalence does not account for the presence of free variables in both formula, not necessarily at the same positions.

version 1.0.10: - feature #242: constant-declaration - issue #238: alpha-equivalence - issue #226: develop minimal logic (M0). - lock mechanism for axiom-inclusion and axiom-interpretation. - new class CollectionDeclaration - issue #229: elaborate intuitionistic logic (j0) theory. - issue #231: compose the theory declaration and list the extended theories. - issue #232: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new inference-rules in a theory. - issue #233: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new axioms / definitions in a theory. - rename theory-elaboration-sequence to theory-derivation which is more accurate. - rename Formula to CompoundFormula. - rename Relation to Connective. - rename Parameter to Terms (in the contect of CompoundFormula). - bug #237: formula equivalence does not account for the presence of free variables in both formula, not necessarily at the same positions. - design flaw correction: UniverseOfDiscourse inherits from TheoreticalObject, and not from SymbolicObject - MGZ21 propositional logic.

version 1.0.10: - new minimal metatheory to support is_declaratively_member_of_class - feature #242: constant-declaration - issue #238: alpha-equivalence - issue #226: develop minimal logic (M0). - lock mechanism for axiom-inclusion and axiom-interpretation. - new class CollectionDeclaration - issue #229: elaborate intuitionistic logic (j0) theory. - issue #231: compose the theory declaration and list the extended theories. - issue #232: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new inference-rules in a theory. - issue #233: provide the capability to forbid the inclusion of new axioms / definitions in a theory. - rename theory-elaboration-sequence to theory-derivation which is more accurate. - rename Formula to CompoundFormula. - rename Relation to Connective. - rename Parameter to Terms (in the contect of CompoundFormula). - bug #237: formula equivalence does not account for the presence of free variables in both formula, not necessarily at the same positions. - design flaw correction: UniverseOfDiscourse inherits from TheoreticalObject, and not from SymbolicObject - MGZ21 propositional logic.

MESSAGE.value: #201 + #195 + correcting proofs by contradiction and refutation with corresponding samples and tests
cleanup + branding
documentation #195
documentation #195 + inference validation #126
documentation #195 + inference validation #126 + support for the composition of collection-like formulae
documentation #195 + inference validation #126 + support for the composition of collection-like formulae + usage of sequent-collection-comma to define inference-rules

documentation #195 + inference validation #126 + support for the composition of collection-like formulae + usage of sequent-collection-comma to define inference-rules + enhanced exceptions with user-friendly reports + #220 interdiction of variable-substitution of propositional objects with non-propositional objects.
develop minimal logic (M0) #226
issue #226: develop minimal logic (M0). lock mechanism for axiom-inclusion and axiom-interpretation.
issue #226: develop minimal logic (M0). lock mechanism for axiom-inclusion and axiom-interpretation. issue #229: elaborate intuitionistic logic (j0) theory.
